preferences.ticket.*.created: Notify me when a ticket gets created
preferences.ticket.*.updated: Notify me when any tickets that i participate in, get updated
preferences.ticket.*.reply.*.created: Notify me when a reply gets added to any tickets i participate in
preferences.ticket.*.reply.*.updated: Notify me when any of my replies get updated
preferences.queue.*.created: Notify me when a queue is created (only affects agents)
preferences.queue.*.updated: Notify me when any queues get updated (only affects agents)
